lines.text: What is she holding?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Attacking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A physical attack? So as soon as one appears, she's going to go ahead and swing. Okay, good. So she's holding that. That ends Pike's turn. Top of the round: Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) No bonus action?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What? Well, I'm going to use my bonus action. Since there's nothing to attack at the moment, I'm going to move slightly to the other end of that little precipice that I'm on, over where Keyleth disappeared.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, over this side?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, get away from things. I'm going to use my bonus action to do a heal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys traveled this way, and this is where you saw the right and left split.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was embarrassing. So that's 11 points of damage. That's great. And then I'm going to hold my attack until something approaches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Gun in one hand, sword in the other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, got it. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we just leave? There's no one here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, that's what I'm doing. So there's no enemies in sight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah! Can I run as far as I can this way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that like five, ten, 15, 20--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50 is what you can get, right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's your movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. I'm going to hold my attack until something stupid shows me its face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to call Trinket away from the wall, so he's going to run down next to Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to kick off and get on my broom, so I'm off the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you get up, and you're now lifted up into the air a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're still blind?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I can see. We've got two light sources now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) I believe I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You believe you can what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Fucking die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) I believe I can touch-- (speaking) What does he touch?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The sky?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The sky. (singing) I think about it every--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't hurt yourself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm never singing in character.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't speak!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) I know just what you're saying!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How high is the ceiling in here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: About 20 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are right up against this ceiling. It's about 12 to 15 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to want to hover right in the middle. I don't want to be high up. I want to be right between the ceiling and the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're about a head's height up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. (Southern accent) And I'm going to hold my action until I can see one of those things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Arrow's notched, ready to fire?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I move ten feet closer to Scanlan, and do the classic Van Damme movement and stand between stalactites in the ceiling and hide with my bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and hide in the ceiling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You going to Time Cop that shit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's awesome!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you doing the splits, right now, are your legs--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nah, I'm just using my feet for that. No, my hands are occupied. With my feet, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stealth check. Yeah, baby.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make a splits check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten. Do I still have sneaky sneak from you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace is still-- Oh, no. No, I Hunter's Marked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine. Pike, get out of the way!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you talk to her like that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 27. And I'll hold my attack action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all holding our shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The minute something shows, we're all going to be like, boom! But nothing's going to show.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing's going to show? Which way were we going when all this shit happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were traveling this way, and this was the split in the path ahead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we're heading left?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we be trying to get out of here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get out of here. We don't need this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: By the way, we're supposed to go to the left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. That's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would've made a run if I had been thinking about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's right? The left?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will go 25 feet the same direction Grog went in, because that's all I can run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. That will get you up here next to Percival.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's dead! Right before the end of the story!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) Stop it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, Perce.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, Matt, I'm sorry. I'm going to go in the opposite direction. I don't want to be in this fucking cluster. It's a mess up there. I'm going the opposite direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Down there? Why does it matter that we're clustered?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They come out: "Where did they go?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The question is, did you turn invisible, then run?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they can still sense you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit! I don't know these things!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we won't know that you didn't get sucked under!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And if you attack, your Invisibility drops.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shut up, that's so cool!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got an invisible woman mini!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is my daughter's miniature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is rad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And as a bonus action, I will Healing Word myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to do Healing Word first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh? Oh, first, because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because if you cast a spell, you lose Invisibility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I would do it first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that. All right, that ends Scanlan's turn. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven more forms show up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First off, let's see--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deuces wild.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Light them up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one is going to emerge from under the ground--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on. You do not. What is the range on your fists?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 50 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it's a ten-foot range on the elemental, then you would, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't say! How do you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Under the slam attack, it should say range: five foot? Melee attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does it say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, no, it doesn't. No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just don't, okay. No! Range: ten feet! It does say range: ten feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I was asking for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your reaction to get an attack of opportunity on it. As he glides away from you and underneath, you get one swing at him. He gets a plus five to his AC. Actually no, he wouldn't, because you have earthglide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits. Go ahead and roll damage with the fist. So you slam him within the stonework.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love that you're actually being a badass where no one can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of damage, all right. As you slam it, your fists gliding through the rock like it was air, and slamming into the side, pushing it even further forward, it swoops underneath. And with a giant uppercut as it emerges from the ground, the earth swings up to try and consume both Grog and Trinket. I need you both to make a dexterity saving throw, Trinket and Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. Danger sense!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, he rolled a one! Oh no, this was a fan gift.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both Grog and Trinket are currently restrained and blinded within the earth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Is Trinket right next to Grog, at least?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're within a close area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, you're inspired.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! It's too late for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say so, the action's already happened. If you want to, you can. It's what it's there for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have a nice DM.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. All right, you barely manage to avoid--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, now Trinket's all alone!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are most gracious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as the rock comes up to consume you, it covers over both of you. And there's a brief moment of silence before Grog bursts out and steps up onto the stone, unaffected by the impact. And that's its full speed, so it can't earthglide again. This one here is going to scoot and appear right around the edge on that side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's in range for me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's a thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. And you do manage to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see it, so you can, if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sorry, I got a notification on my iPad that went like, "no music."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I effectively sneak attacking the fool?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tremor sense-- As you put your feet against the stalactites, it seems to know where you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cool. Sharpshooter for both.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The first one definitely hits. The second one is 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 28 and 26 for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you fucking kidding me? He's not Hunter's Marked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 38 combined, for my two. My paladin attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 27, combined.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As it emerges from behind, you watch as it brings back both of its fists to attempt to slam into the ground where Scanlan is currently standing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. His heavy footfalls still touching and moving the earth in the vicinity, its tremor sense still notifying it of your base location. As he goes to swing both of his fists--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm mocking him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A flurry of daggers and arrows go flying through the air (whoosh) slamming into it before its fist can come down. Its chest is detonated from the impact, the rock and shale scattering against the sides of the wall, its form destroyed and scattered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a pretty fucking killer twin moment, right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got to ask, when the creepy rock guy popped up near me, is he within my held action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no. He's about ten feet from you. You've hit in the space, but the bear was closer to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. I just stare at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This fellow here emerges right behind Percival, right there. And is going to attempt to make two swing attacks at you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I make two attacks on him before anything happens, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's a little drunk. He's got that Soulja lean going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is this with your gun?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this is sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 22 and 24.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need more coffee.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're at your most dashing when you use your sword.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, you know. That's 26 points of damage. Oh, wait! I get three attacks, don't I, that's right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! Because you're on fire, dude!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's right. 26 points of damage plus-- Oh yeah, that definitely hits. Plus eight more points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as it emerges from the wall, coming toward you. You do this triple strike against it. And it manages to carve across part of its chest, but its momentum is still strong, and both fists come to the side to hit you and rattle you from both sides. That is a 16?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses! And a 24.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you manage to deflect one blow, the other one clocks you on the side of the head. That is 11 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, okay. There's all the healing I just did. It's all gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And now this fellow here is going to swoop over and slam the ground near Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good! She can attack him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The range on this is a ten by ten-foot cube, so he's going to do it before he gets in melee range of her, she's right there. So as it glides toward her, it slams the ground, and the earth is going to attempt to consume her. She needs to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should not have claimed this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With that dice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. We don't add anything to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is a big seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, the ground consumes Pike, who is now buried, blinded, and restrained within.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She was saving her action, though!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with the rest of its movement, it's going to sink into the ground. We'll say-- (counting) Yeah, it'll sink into the ground. Just out of range. I'll put it here, just to mention where it is, but consider it's not prone, it's underground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It means he gave it rum tongue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With such dedication!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one here is going to swing back around--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Attack of opportunity!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She already took one. One reaction. This one bursts out of the ground to leap towards you. As it emerges, it looks up and sees you just within its range, it does have a bit of a reach. And it leaps to go ahead and make two swings at you. Natural one. You manage to pull back with the broom and it swings wide and lands on the ground, and it's going to attempt to go with another uppercut in your direction. That is a 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't hit. I put my foot on its fist and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Ding! No effect on that. And that's going to end its turn, that's his full move. All right, so that brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Do I see Trinket underground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can sense Trinket is currently buried.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, thank you so much!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus, that scared the shit out of me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said "I want coffee," and you got coffee?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! But I didn't think anybody was going to do it, really!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I want a pony!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want ice cream!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fly into the air!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want that PowerBall winnings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If anyone could do it, Ryan Green could. All righty. So, Keyleth, you can sense Trinket is buried over there, and Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I go for the bear, or do I go for the gnome?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go for the gnome!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, can I get to Pike in 50 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50 feet glide? You can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Can I very gently grab the gnome, and then siege monster bust us out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a strength check. I'll give you advantage because you are a siege monster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because you're a siege monster!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a siege monster!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it like reaching into a sack for you, even though it's the earth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like air, he said. I will take that 17, that is much better. For a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With no issue, you punch through the massive rock and earth right there, and you emerge out of it like a shoryuken, clutching Pike in your left arm as you land back on your elemental feet in that space, bringing both of you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (excited earth elemental grunting)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (answering grunts) It sounds like a concrete mixer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. I believe that ends your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't do anything else, probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike can, because it's her turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But Pike can! So holding little Pike like a voodoo doll, like a flashlight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do things!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That means she can still attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can't see anything, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she can, now. Keyleth just pulled her out of the rubble and is holding her in front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I mean, there's nothing to attack in front of her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's this thing on the ground?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's underground, still.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So there's two above ground, but they're behind her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I'm holding Pike! Can she see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you throw her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're holding a physical action, so she has to be next to something in order to attack it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's why mine didn't happen, either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she can do whatever she wants.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it would be an action to chuck her, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she already pulled her free with her action, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you use all your movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, actually, you had ten more feet, if you wanted to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you get within ten feet of something? Five feet of something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, unfortunately, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, we could drop her where the thing disappeared. It's still a crapshoot, but it's better than nothing. "Drop me on the ground, Keyleth!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "I want to be able to hit it if it comes up!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (agreeing elemental grunts) (heavy thud)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sets the gnome down on the ground. That ends Keyleth's turn. Now it's Pike's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, she is going to still just hold her turn--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man! Should she do a cantrip? She should do a Resistance or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, cast Resistance on herself in case--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But that's an action, it's not a bonus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Instead, she's going to look at the ground and go, "Monstah!" And hold her mace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So she's holding her action to attack, perfect. Percival, you're up. Top of the round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull out the gun and take three shots at that thing that's swinging at Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! Oof, that's close. That's a 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then the rest of them hit, too. It's like 21 and 20, so let's get some d10s out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need some more?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I got enough. Some d10s and some d6s. So here we go. (counting) That's 12 points of psychic damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (makes weird noise)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what that was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is weird energy at this table!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the first shot? As you reach over and fire at that one, you hit it, and you watch as it scatters into stones across the far--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll put the first shot at that, and then shift the next two to the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. They have the same AC.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so that's seven points of psychic damage, and 36 points of normal damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To that one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as the second one does blast a large chunk out of its torso and side, it still stands there with its angered arms open, ready to swing at whatever comes at it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Percival's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (grunts) Can I run over to the thing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're standing above Trinket now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just a pound of earth, right? I don't hear anything, or see any fur or claws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not in a rage, you don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's better! Thank god for reckless! Sorry, 30 minus five, 25!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! 33, plus the necrotic damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to help. I'm right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a guy next to you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I'm going to be aiming at, darling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Second attack. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you still have 45 feet of movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I run down this tunnel and see what's down here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's raging! He doesn't have logic!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see him from wherever I am? This enemy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'd say you can. He's emerged. You can see the movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll run up and join Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you charge up beside, leap onto this platform of soft earth and rock, and it's right there next to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn. Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to move my Hunter's Mark over to that dude (radar sounds) and then I'm going to attack him with sharpshooter!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs) Didgeridoos?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or rain sticks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm at 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. This is so weird!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is super serious, you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four lightning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, you'll be sleeping a lot at Burning Man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 28 for the first arrow. Plus the four lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then the second attack is also sharpshooter, and that one hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Even with the minus five?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Definitely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam, when everyone leaves, all their stress will enter you and I.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very excited about that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six lightning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a lich. A phylactery.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19! Oh! And I didn't add plus 20 to both of those! Plus 20 overall because of the sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So with that, as you see it crawling towards Percival, trying to grow and leap at it, and Grog leaps up in its way, there's a very little space where you can actually see its movement. And as you watch Grog pull back with the axe to almost go for a secondary strike, that brief opening, you see you have both arrows notched and releasing both at the same time and as it does it sinks into both of the sockets where the dark void of its eyes were. And it goes (creaking, crashing) and then falls into scattered pieces of rock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're welcome!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, very nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Do you want to move, or stay where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! What about Trinket? Can he try to save against it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check. Strength saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what the difference for a saving throw for Trinket would be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Unfortunately, cannot break free. It's not strong enough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I hear him? Does he make noise?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You listen, and you hear the shifting of rock. That's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't even know it's Trinket, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I aim my bow at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vax, what are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to fly over and land on Keyleth's shoulder and hold my attack for as soon as the fucknut appears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perch. Dagon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like your own personal raven. All right, ending Vax's turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To climb up that tree-like stalagmite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This technically is a root, and you climb up into it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will hold my attack until I see something come out of somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so your weapon's at the ready?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My Wand of Magic Missiles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Great. All right, so that ends Scanlan's turn. At this point, shifting beneath the ground and emerging right there behind Pike--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's attacking it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It gets to act first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it? No, she gets to act first. Yeah! So that's 24 to attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 to attack? That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And she'll use divine whatsit. Divine Strike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She always gets that now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Once a round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 2d6 plus four radiant damage, so ten, 14.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus 2d8.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought that went in the coffee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should that count?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You didn't intentionally roll it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do it again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not as good as the unintentional, but that's okay. 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Does she just attack the once?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and if it's still standing, dagger, dagger, dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The war cleric... Actually, yeah, because it's a bonus action to do that. Against that one? How does Pike want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pikey!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She goes, "Grog, watch this!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't see anything because a person's in the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can see; you're big.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She does an underswing right up between its legs and hits it in the goolies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she does, the glowing mace scatters upward, breaking layer after layer of rock and earth. Its upper torso explodes into the ceiling, a shower of small pebbles and errant pieces of earth are smeared across the wall and scatter to the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Untamed monster!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She gives it three or four more hits on the ground out of frustration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because she got trapped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go rescue the bear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be careful! I think there's another elemental right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there any more?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think Trinket's an elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all make your way over to the pile, as it's shifting and moving, you all prepare your weaponry for what might emerge. Make a perception check, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, don't you make me attack my own bear. Oh no. 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's plenty. The moment you see some of the movement push through, a claw begins to emerge from it and your arrow pulls back, ready to release, but the moment it's there, you immediately wonder how you could have made that mistake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket! I run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you rush over and begin to help Trinket free.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I place my hand on Scanlan's shoulder and say: I'm sorry. I know this is hard for you. The bear lives.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I say from the top of the tree, I don't know who you're touching, but I'm up on top of a tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm flying!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a lot of rules in this game. Staying on theme for the night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She wouldn't even know where I was coming from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would see you the minute you attacked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this battle has transpired in the length of one stride of the Titan, as the other footfall lands, (thumping) one portion of the wall begins to shake and fall in and this side of the tunnel begins to collapse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we got to take off, we got to start moving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth blocks as much as she can and goes (earth elemental speaking).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Run. I think she's saying run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys dart down and head left into the hallway, your earth elemental form allows you with quite a bit of strength to force it and prevent it from causing the entire tunnel to collapse. Just half of it does, and holding that in space you guys begin to charge down the left side of the tunnel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we're running I cast Pass Without A Trace again. Should I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I pat your big stony face and give it a kiss and fly down the hall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, never mind, I don't cast it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys continue down the left path for about 50 or so feet, it curves rapidly to the left and stops at a cylindrical chamber. It's still a cavernous space, but it has a cylindrical shape to it. About 40 feet in diameter, about 50 feet tall at its apex, and in the center of it, you see a partially collapsed dark stone pavilion or small temple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At the bottom in the middle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you guys turn and it's in the center of this chamber that rises up before you in the center of this small, egg-shaped opening, the space. And you see this made of a deep, dark, grayish, almost black stone structure that looks beautifully made. The craftwork is distinctly dwarven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it old?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go make an investigation check on it if you'd like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to do Divine Sense again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For undead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do sense--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Specifically a location.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --specifically within the heart of this structure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this--? No, this is not mountain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is titan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (Laura voice) Is this favored terrain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be considered subterranean. It would be like an underground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so not Underdark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not Underdark, no. The structure, however, is somewhat damaged from a collapse on one side of the wall. You watch as part of the chamber on the right side has come loose and this rockslide has jammed into the side of the structure. And looking past the craggy piles of loose rock, you can see shattered glass across the ground, and part of the rock as the rockslide has pushed into one of these glass panels that marks the exterior of the small, gazebo-like temple structure. It seems to have filled, from what you can see at least at this distance, a portion of the interior as well. There is a double door in the front that is currently closed and the right side of the door is buried partially by the remainder of this rockslide that has come to a halt at the base of the structure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we know what gods dwarves worshipped? Do they have specific gods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike starts whispering, "I can technically destroy dead things, so, if we sneak me up to the "outside of the wall--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you ran into the Allfather's space before, but not every dwarf worships the Allfather. Just like any other free race in the world, religion's up for grabs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Knowing the history of this city, would we know what this is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to have been placed here with intent away from a large part of society.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not a crypt or anything like that? Or a very expensive crypt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we see the inside of the gazebo-type structure?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How big is it, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How big is it? It's about, maybe, I'd say, 35 feet wide? It almost fills the entirety of the chamber. There's like a slight space behind it, except for the fact that part of the wall collapsed into it and is burying the right side of the structure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Colored glass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks to be of stained glass type, and it's a thick glass. And there is one intact window of stained glass on the opposite side and there is the double doors currently that keep it shut.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it depicting something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks to depict a dwarvish-like figure, adorned in golden armor, that stands at the precipice of a mountain, with a series of smaller dwarf-like entities in shadow all around looking up at it. It's very simple when you get up close to it, but the further back you go, it's a beautiful arrangement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I bet it's a crypt, which means that it's trapped, and I bet that means there's something expensive and interesting inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I can't remember for sure, didn't, in our story somewhere, we come up with a solution for Pike's noisiness? Something that quieted her down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She had stealth boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, her boots, they gave her advantage on stealth, which meant that she just made a regular roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Regular roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We made her that armor that we never went back and picked up because we fucked up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but it doesn't matter because she's got the Dawnmartyr.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She casts Guidance on herself to help with that roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm with you. I think this thing has a yield.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm feeling it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Break all the glass, go inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I touch the ground, still in my earth elemental form, do I sense anything? Tremor sense? Any vibrations?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, another footfall hits from the titan and it causes the entirety of the chamber to quake and it's almost like, you know when Superman opens up his perception too wide and hears all the voices?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything around you shakes with such an intense ferocity, it causes your head to shake briefly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have another DM question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For paladins, "Until the end of your next turn, you know the location of

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I know the location of

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know where? Can you sense where it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's in the center of this structure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Center.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Let's do this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to fight it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I bet there's something really nice inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, I mean, if Pike can get up and get a peek in, she could take a first shot at turning it. Turnt. Stay turnt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So there are the double doors and then it's a cave-in on one side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On one side, and it's broken one of two sets of stained glass on the front of it, and it seems to have filled part of the interior. Currently, there isn't enough space in that window to climb in. It's filled with rock. You could try and move stuff out of the way, or go through the doors, or break the other windows. Those are the only types of entrance you can find.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And there's no other exit from this cylindrical chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That you see, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wonder if getting Pike on the broom or the rug could improve her chances of sneaking up to the door as well, and get a peek in, and try to turn whatever's inside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I mean we could try it. I'll put Pike on the broom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we'll fly over to the side of the cave-in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can just earth glide under and peek up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but she can turn undead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But how many times can she do that in a day? Is that a pull the trigger and once? Do we want to waste it on something--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As an action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unlimited.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As an action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it a spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean it could be an undead--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A Channel Divinity, is that what you're talking about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It just works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, you can use your Channel Divinity

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so she can do that. She's got a couple of other things she can do with this ability.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And is she 18th level?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's 18th level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, so now she can do it three times between rests.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's worth a shot, because we could one-shot a thing, possibly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's 17th right now-- oh no, I think she just leveled up. I'll double check. No, because

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just hit 18th.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, so she's still 17th.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Possible one shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might just be a dwarven king.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's see what happens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Probably is, he's just undead now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we should try to get her in and turn him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, let's do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or he's totally encased by the material and if we unearth him--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It could be bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or he's unearthed and-- yeah he could be blocking a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let sleeping dogs lie?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy really wants to find treasure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, which is always a bad sign, but there it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's do this!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In what realm of possibility are we not going into this thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we could just turn around and walk away and find our way up to the city!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have we ever done that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go check that door before I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys go, everybody hang back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check for traps!

lines.name: LIAM

It's partially buried and it isn't locked, but you can see there are some runic carvings along the perimeter of the doorway, similar to what you saw earlier on the pieces of stone when you first entered, and there are signs of forced entry. It looks like there are parts of the stone that have been chipped, familiar to you from people that use crowbars or other materials to break into entry places. It looks like there have been signs of forced entry in the past.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: Ten. So that's 20 points of damage, because it's doubled. As you slam your fist into the stone door, the door cracks and part of it splinters and falls, toppling past your shoulders and bouncing you in the head a bit. The door suffered severe damage and probably wouldn't sustain another blow.

lines.text: You slam a second time, you don't have to roll damage. Even with the additional modifier it's enough. The door (crumbling) crumples inward and falls inside the actual chamber as your fist turns it into shattered rock and dust.

lines.text: Okay, as you guys glance inside briefly this ten-foot wide-- well, it's actually more like a six-foot wide door side on this point, glancing inside it's another circular chamber that's like an outer hallway maybe five feet wide, six feet wide, and an interior chamber. It looks like a smaller cylinder on the inside that is currently locked. You don't see anything within there. You see to the right immediately the rockslide has filled most of the chamber and comes to rest just about the corner of a single large antique bronze door that's pushed into this central chamber about 15 feet wide.

lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.text: Okay.

lines.text: No, no, I'm joking!

lines.text: Yeah!

lines.text: You go ahead and inspect the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you go and take a moment and check the door, there is a bronze image faintly carved into it of a stocky dwarven man with a thick beard that touches his toes. It completely covers the front of his body. He wears plated armor that comes to dangerous, jagged, curved-up points. As far as dwarves go, this one looks about as unhappy and unapproachable as any dwarf, and you've encountered some pretty gnarly dwarves in your time. As you glance down, there does appear to be an opening for a key and there is an oval turning mechanism, like a vault door, like a smaller vault.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to check for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's 20.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, what could it hurt? Oh, not that good though. No, lower than what you rolled.

lines.text: Oh shit. There's no traps.

lines.text: To?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not in this room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you and Pike, you're in the back of the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm right by the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's everyone doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Outside the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm outside, waiting for a call.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm right next to him.

lines.text: All right. So it's a total of what?

lines.text: Total of 37. I'm a level 18 rogue!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who just rolled a natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On a lockpick DC of 30, you manage to somehow find the intricacy of a king dwarf sarcophagus sealed door. It takes you a good two to three minutes to carefully find the proper tumblers and hold them without it breaking or ruining the lock, but you manage to feel something shift, and a slight latch mechanism on the other side go (creaking). At which point, the brass door from the front door's jaw goes (door opening) and pours forth this green fume that fills the entirety of the chamber. Scanlan, Pike, and Vax, I need you and you because you're still in the back of the chamber--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm by the door though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you're inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You said you were back in the chamber by the door, it's on the outskirt. I need you all to make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 18, for me.
