lines.text: How do you know that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's like, people still make these things?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a cincture. Like Spanx.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I've never seen that word before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, Freddie. Get excited. I found a spyglass covered in diarrhea. Would you like it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Clean it, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is this creature? Do we know what this creature is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be an arcana check on this one, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because he's enjoying his belt, can I take out--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is anyone here trained in arcana?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'm not proficient in it, weirdly, but I am an arcanist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, make a check with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not entirely certain what this is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that with your arcana?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it's ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well that's better than four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but it's still sucky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I take out the black metallic hammer now that he's all excited about his belt and begin my attuning period?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're going to attune. Are you guys going to wait for him or are you going to walk with him as--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No we're not fucking waiting for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you look at the creature and leave it there in the water. You begin concentrating on the hammer. What are you unattuning from to take its place?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Instead of the Bloodaxe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you set the Bloodaxe away and attune to the adamantine hammer as you begin to trek further into--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything else interesting in this cavern? That we can see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to that in a minute. As you begin to leave the watered pool to head further into this chasm, we're going to take a break. Because it's been a while. We'll be back here in a little bit, guys. We do have this Wenge Dice Vault for one of you guys to win from our friends over at Wyrmwood. This is the same wood that I use for my dice box over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Danoba will contact you for your information and we'll get that sent out to you, so well done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what? 82 people tweeted me that Pike speaks Dwarvish. So thanks guys, thanks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, thank you for informing us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (garbled) Who cares? I speak Dwarvish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like to think that Pike could, but wanted to let him do it. "You can do it." She taught him to write, taught him to read. She's like, "Good job."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. I'm a scholar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, before we get started, Laura, something you wanted to mention at the beginning, but you weren't here for the announcements.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, yeah. Uncharted: The Lost Legacy came out this week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's so good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should check it out!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You play Nadine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I play Nadine. You should go see it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You should go see it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At a theater near you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At a drive-in near you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go see it, and then play it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a match-three game, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and also Marvel's Spider-Man show premiered on the 19th. I'm Gwen Stacy on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm the Rhino on that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your shirt's so dope, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw the episode, too, and it was really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so bringing it back in. As you've left the pool and the body behind, you continue further into this chasm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not that we heard anything about what you just did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You might have seen a corpse in the water, floating.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't pay attention to that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanted to look in the chamber and see if there was anything else interesting before we walked out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number of dwarven buildings in the vicinity. Some are partially or completely collapsed. Some had fallen from outcroppings and platforms that have since fallen into the center of the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's almost as if this room is meant to introduce something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stop it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a perception. It was?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't roll it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't roll yet? That's right; you did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To perceive a dead body in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29. Glancing about, there's the continuation of the path. The chasm seems to be pinching a bit the further forward you go; it's closing in. You see six dwarven households or structures that could be entered, that look structurally enough sound that they're standing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they look rich?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this perspective? Everything looks pretty wrecked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. We're in a hurry, right? I'm not going to go search for stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're just impeding your progress.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's have a look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll look around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There does not appear to be any locking mechanism. There doesn't appear to be any traps around it. They're just two stone slabs that are jammed together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No hinges, no nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (clears throat)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, Greg?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I just had a tickle in my throat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you want to smash your way through this very loudly?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, did you want me to smash through this very loudly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gently, with a push, maybe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe try to push it first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fine. Can I push? Wait. Can I try pushing on one of the slabs? The right slab.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make a strength check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is backing the fuck up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm backing up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your fingers (cracking) dig into the stone, and it cracks around the exterior where you push about an inch into the stonework with your Gauntlets. As you push, you watch as the surrounding edges of the stone door-- this is the right or the left one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The right one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The right one, right. You watch as where it meets the stone, cracks begin to form at the edge and with one shift (shifting), it seems to push forward and (falling and impacting). You actually broke whatever mechanism was holding it in place and caused that side of the door to fall inward (booming). As it hits the ground, you hear the echo (echoing boom).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, I know a saying for this: They make them like they used to!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's relevant. Accurate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see anything immediately in the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is pitch black inside. There is no light or light source.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at that! A modifier of zero. 18. I have darkvision because of the belt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, not bad. All right. So you glance inside the lightless chamber. First off, the smell of rot and time, I guess you could say; that dusty, old, ancient, untouched scent wafts from the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A really old fart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. As you glance inside, you find a single chamber before you that splits off into two other chambers, all rectangular, and there are two other subchambers that are beyond you. These stand about 20 feet tall at the height and about 40 feet wide on the one that's on the farthest side, and you can't make it far past to the secondary chamber to the right. And it's asymmetrical; one seems closer than the other. There's essentially three chambers that are all attached together, with small entryways that lead to each. The floor is covered in flaked shale, dirt, the occasional glitter of some sort of errant coin or gold piece or copper piece. At this point, again you hear the distant (booming) of a titan footfall. The chamber shakes, and a fresh layer of dust falls, clouds a bit, before resting to the floor. That's the most you can make out at first glance inside this chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's more tunnels.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looking for traps, dead guys, from the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a peek and check to see if there's signs of any cave-in potentials? Potential cave-ins?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I feel if there's any wind coming from one of the tunnels, like there's an opening somewhere that leads out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With your face?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing about this chamber, it's very well made. In fact, based on the smatterings of gold on the ground and glancing about the way it's built, this looks to be specifically a vault. This once contained probably a portion of the wealth of the people of this town.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, somebody rolled this place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't hear anybody or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at the moment, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 18 investigation check for traps and dead guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 25 for wind! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a faint bit of airflow through the chamber now that this door is open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I tell where it's coming from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is coming from the front of you and to the right, the chamber you haven't been able to look past entirely, to the right. You glance about in the entryway now that's open before you. There does not appear to be any trapped mechanism in front of you. There are areas where some of the walls have caved in slightly. The ceiling is solid, but there are portions where some of the wall has come in, and you can see where rockslides have come to rest on each side and filled in some of the corners. There are piles of rags and other wayward bits of materials that have been left behind and left to rot or sit. There's an awful, almost citrusy rot smell coming from one of the far chambers on the left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drag in the human, escort him in, and go ahead and light up my hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your hands open up. Pike has?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Her mace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her mace. Do you come in, as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you all walk into the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think there's an exit ahead and to the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're glancing and doing your investigation, looking around, to confirm that this was once a vault that held quite a bit of wealth, you look at the base of the wall-- the parts that you can see that aren't buried-- and you can see scrapes and grooves. Hundreds of them, like there were once many coins and other heavy metallic materials that were placed in here that scraped against the stone as they were once on the ground. About maybe three inches off the ground, you can see this layer of metallic scrapes across the stonework that this place once contained a fair amount of wealth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So if dudes came in here and put stuff in sacks, there wouldn't be scrapes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably a long time ago, based on the center. You do notice that one of the piles of rags begins to twitch and shift ahead of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mini Jenga.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mini Jenga?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, there's something under that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Maybe you should kill it before it says anything to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to? I don't think it's a small child down here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've become Death, Destroyer of Worlds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Dagger, dagger, dagger!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you want to do, Sis?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. This is all you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Detect undead?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't have much of that left. Yeah, my last one, I'll use it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your last one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My last one. Detect undead, Divine Sense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this shifting midpoint where its form and whatever cursed enchantment is held within it or disease that claims its body is battling its nature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, right now, it's charging, and I need you to roll initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That fast?! Oh fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slowly emerged and then (snarling) charged in your direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yay, maps!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's using all the maps we didn't use in Indianapolis!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (mockingly) Indianapolis!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am drunk! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Indianapolis!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at all the gold!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's the rag side there. Vax would've been right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at this great tile work! I love Dwarven Forge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singsong) They do good shit! If you guys'd like to place yourselves--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, will you leave all this stuff for me when you go to Burning Man, so I can use it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Talk to Dani; she's watching our house. You can borrow whatever's in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are taking that bird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You steal my bird, you die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I guess I'd be next to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You steal my bird, she will pluck your eyes out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bear is with Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With Grog? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket really likes Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Scanlan? You just entered the chamber behind everybody else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on in here, guys? (screaming)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a big guy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. 25 to 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's our Percival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Always first. All right, and then Vex. 20 to 15?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I didn't roll for Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! 16 for Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, all right. Pike's before Grog.

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Pickle wreck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's turned into a battle cry. Pickle wreck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 15 to ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five? Keyleth, what did you get?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is going on?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did you do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a one, that's how. I rolled a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm shooting it in the foot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Burning that. That's a 22?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22? All right, 22 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you shooting it with?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a gun. Oh, that's nice. Yeah, that's 17 points of damage, plus five psychic. And it has to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 20. What is your--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it succeeds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it. That's fine. I'm going to shoot it in the foot again, because that's what we do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's cocked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that cocked? Goddamn it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was so close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. That's okay. That's an 18. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You almost critted.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. That's ten points of damage, plus five psychic. And again: strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 23.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 16. And pretty strong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all right. And to make life a little more fun, let's take a head shot, because obviously he doesn't want to go down. And that's a 25. That hits. That's one more of those and one more of these. And that's 11 points of damage, plus three psychic. 14 points of damage and a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Wow, that's a 26.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Holy fuck! Never-goddamn-mind. And with that, I'm going to dart in back behind Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow. That was rough, buddy. I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'll use my bonus to reload.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That ends Percival's turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hunter's Mark!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Who are you marking? That guy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That troll that I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. There is the one troll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Hunter's Mark Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. And there you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. And I'm going to shoot him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a natural one! So as you mark him, you pull out the first arrow and you yank backward, and as the arrow string tenses, the actual shaft seems to snap in place. The arrow had somehow dry-rotted through your travels. Chuck it at the ground and pull another.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, this one is going to be sharpshooter with Blazing Bowstring, so hopefully-- goddamn it! What the fuck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh! Two!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So what's the total bonus on that one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is happening to us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, that's 11 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that missed. Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus H. Macy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first arrow shatters in place, then pull out the second one and go to fire, and as you strike, the arrow seems like it should hit it, but instead it hits one of the rags over its shoulder that makes it look like its mass is larger than it is, and it passes through harmlessly, causing the rag to flutter off, revealing its shoulder. You can see the bits of greenish muscle and sinew showing up beneath one of the gashes of its rotted shoulder. You're going to move or Trinket can move?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I climb up those rocks behind me and stand on the top of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. On top of the rocks there, getting ready to fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then Trinket is going to run over and stand next to Pike. He's going to try to protect us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he move far enough to be on the other side of her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. What's his movement? Is it 30 or 40?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40? He could, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he goes to the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending your turn. Pike's up next.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (impact) Kind of a gooch-smashing day, so she's going to walk right up to him and slam it right into his junk, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really, that's what she's going to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is what she's going to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess it's undead. She can't try to turn undead?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if she wants to use one of three channel divinities for today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's hitting him in the gooch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. Good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus the what's it called? Divine Strike, so three plus four is seven, plus the 2d8. That ain't a d8. That's 13. 21. To the gooch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. (impact) She runs up and slams it with the side of the mace. As it hits, you can see there's a flash of radiant energy and it burns away some of the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It takes an additional 2d6 radiant because he's undead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes! That's right. Fiend or undead take extra 2d6 radiant damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With her Mace of Disruption.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. What's the additional damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever I just told you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And now I'm going to roll for that extra--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just did; it's seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the first damage roll you did to do 21 points of damage to her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was the Mace of Disruption.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 2d6 plus four radiant damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus Divine Strike. Once on each turn, add 2d8 of weapon damage to your damage total.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's what all he rolled, and then since it's undead, it's an additional 2d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 2d8. Yeah. Fuck yeah! All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An additional seven because he's undead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So 28 total.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gun cocking) Gooch shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is actually pretty damn nasty. Worth doing cleric.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She needs to jump up to hit it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's at 18, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's at 18?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not sure. 17 or 18. Real life is hazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can use a bonus action to hit again if she wants. That's one of her war domain abilities.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, fuck yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Double gooch shot!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One for each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 23 hits. Roll damage again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 2d6. So we're at 12 plus five plus-- no, once per turn. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second one hits, not as impactful but still, it looks relatively hurt. That ends Pike's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can't she move away from him? Oh, no, because he will get an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She could move back five, but it will get an attack of opportunity if she does that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, she's going to face him down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to rage and run up and to this doorway. Five, 10, 15, 20. Can I see anything in this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. I don't see anything. Oh, do I feel anything from the black metallic hammer that I'm holding?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, you've been trying to attune to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think you've had time yet to fully attune to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a half hour ago, at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The break doesn't exist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not really enough time. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He started attuning to it as soon as Percy felt something from the belt, so if it's been long enough?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can say no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to keep coming in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, I'll let you attune to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah? I'll attune to it. I want to attune to it first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You go blind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insta-death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to attack the guy with it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I don't see anything in the room, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see anything in the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make my way through here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Grog, I'm so glad we're together at last.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Starts talking to him

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if it heals him? He hits him so hard it actually puts health points back into him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Craven Edge. He just got a make-over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make a reckless attack against him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Craven Head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Craven Head. That's not great. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the natural roll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A six? As you swing the hammer, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. This is something weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer 23 points of bludgeoning damage as you swing and clobber yourself across the face with the hammer.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm drunk. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it like if you roll below a certain thing you hit yourself instead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 23, so half of that is 12. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you pull back and (whack). You're taken aback by it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so amused.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I try again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, roll high!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless, great weapon master.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do you always get the fucked-up weapon?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is going to knock him out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Finally, an enemy that can kill Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've been doing a d12. Is that appropriate for the hammer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, did you do a d12 last time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. So I'd to do a d10?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the warhammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two-handed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Warhammer is 1d8, but if you're a versatile two-handed, it's a d10.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. It's fine for the last one. Since you took it to the face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'd be amazing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it wouldn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's with the double?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, you forgot to add stuff?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a crit, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Double the dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 46, okay. So you reach back with the hammer after shaking your head, and with a giant, angry yell, (yelling) the hammer comes down and cracks into the face of the troll, causing its head to push into its ribcage, and it falls to the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to get back up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it does not make its saving throw. It falls to the ground, unmoving. Crushed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was better. Ow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, is that your turn, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So next I'm up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that other room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there other shit in there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't know what's in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right. I'm going to move past Pike, past the troll, and hold my action should anything come from that room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what are you holding?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I see a creature running at any of us, I'm going to throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. That ends your turn, holding your action. Rushing around the corner immediately, you hear this (growling) as these black-drooling undead trolls, their eyes like a jet-black bead, hints of light hitting the shine of it, like shark eyes. This one rushes past.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He goes for Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. (dagger noises) Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck shit up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going before them in the order. Does that mean I get advantage, due to assassin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because this is their turn. You're reacting to their action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cool,. 25 for the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Second is a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Third is a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't get a bonus action, because this is only an action you held.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which I probably forgot that earlier; it's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, so what did I say for the first two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, cool. But no sneak attack at all, so here they come. First one is 11, plus psychic damage is 17 for the first, and the second one is 15 for the second. 17 and 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are good attacks without sneak attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as it turns around the corner (snarling) and it goes into a sprint towards you, rushing forward, it's going to go ahead and attack you twice with its claws and one with its bite. The claw attack is 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You dodge out of the first claw. It strikes upward with its other hand. That is a 22.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That does hit. I'll use Uncanny Dodge on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 17 points of slashing damage reduced to eight. Eight points slashing damage, and its bite attack. That's a natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six points of piercing damage, and I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (speaking) That is a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you drop it, or did you roll it intentionally?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean? I'll roll it again, if you want. I don't care. I'm rolling it again! That's way worse: nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looked like he dropped it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looked like you dropped it. Okay. Good to know. All right. So then the other one that's rushing up to you, Keyleth, is going to attack you, as well. That is a 17 to hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Cutting Words to take that down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, thanks, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll your d12.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We know, baby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've just peaked, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So with that enough of a distraction, his head turns to you over her shoulder, and the swing goes wide. Second claw strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only because I turn around at Scanlan and go: (laughs) That's good. Aw, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is just enough for it to roll a 19 on its second attack with the claw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I go: Ugh! Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which deals 14 points of slashing damage, and it's going to go in for a bite after the claw strikes at you and grabs your shoulder and it pulls you in. Its troll mouth almost seems to hyperextend as it snaps down towards your shoulder. That is a 22.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not the mantle! Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take eight points of piercing damage, and make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me take my antlers off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold my antlers! Yeah, that's good. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold my antlers, girl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to the one. So the one on the ground that had been slaughtered by Pike, its wounds seem to heal up slightly, and as it gets up from the ground, it's going to strike out towards Pike. Getting up from prone. So the first strike is-- that's cocked. That is 24 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. She takes eight points of slashing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second attack is (counting) 25.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, 25 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of slashing damage, and as it grabs both sides of her armor, it's going to actually lift her off the ground and pull her towards its mouth. Its jaw (snarling) opens up to almost alligator-chomp down on her. The sides of its mouth almost curve back towards its neck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fucked up, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a seven plus nine, a 16, which I don't believe-- she brings her shield up just in place, and as the top jaw comes down on the edge of her shoulder armor, the shield takes the bottom jaw, and she just manages to wrestle it off of her and land on her feet, unscathed by the bite. That's going to end their turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? Oh god. I'm not wasting my shit on them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. That's the problem. None of us want to do anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're moving up to this guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, 20!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 16. That's a 26 to hit. Yeah, 1d8! Three! Plus four, that's seven. Oh, but wait, there's more! Plus four. 11 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage. As you rush up and slip it right into the sternum of the troll creature, it goes through and points out the other side. It goes (snarl). You pull it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a matador, I turn my back to him, because I don't think he can hit me. I don't think he's got it in him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect! Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That one that just got up is irritating me, so I'm going to start by shooting him in the face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's irritating. So that's a 32 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 12 points of damage plus five psychic, so 17 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of damage. All right. So as you hit it, (gunshot) you blow a large chunk out of its side, a wound that should have knocked it down, and it still stands and looks towards you (growling).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's irritating. All right. Hitting it again. That's 26 to hit. And that's, ugh! Nine points of damage and one psychic. That's ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ten points of damage. (chuckles) Once again, another shot (gunshot) blows out part of its ribcage, and you see organs (slurping) slop out onto the ground, and it--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For fuck's sake. Are we missing something here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're regenerating. Something's holding them together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it could be their version of Death Ward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, fine, all right. I'm taking a third shot on that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it we're going to have to do radiant damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've fought trolls before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't remember them. When were they?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a long time ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't fire work on trolls?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fire does work on trolls, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why I was hoping my bowstrings would work, but I missed my shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, that was dumb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, irritated by that one, I'm going to turn my attention to the one that's bothering Keyleth and Scanlan, and I'm going to take a headshot at it. Burning grit, because fuck it, it regenerates. Let's take a headshot. And that's 32 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's 16 points of damage plus three psychic, so that's 19 points of damage. And he has to do a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God fucking damn it. Stop it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry. I'm rolling really well for their saving throws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really irritating. I wasted so much grit, and nothing's happened. All right, I'm going to back up even further out of the room. I'm going to back up to the very edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So we'll say you back up over there. You're now backing down into the tunnel where you guys had risen up before you got to the door.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: T-pose, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Percival's turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need some fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I don't have any of that. Well, but my Blazing Bowstring. I'm going to try it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe something else, like poison or acid? Isn't it acid?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to shoot the one that I tried to hit before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Want to leave Hunter's Mark on it, still?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to do it. I'm going to try sharpshooter again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Goddamn it. That doesn't hit. (sighs) Okay, I'm going to try it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So was it a three?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus 14, minus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That one hits! That definitely hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's on foam, but it's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is, yeah. So that hits, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I didn't say Blazing Bowstring, so it doesn't count. 14 plus one lightning damage. Yeah, sneak attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're good on health, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (scoffs) Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus six is 14 for the sneak attack. and then five for Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And Blazing Bowstring?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't say Blazing Bowstring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Okay. So the arrow (impact) hits it in the chest area. You watch as part of its ribcage caves in from the blow, and it actually exits out the back. None of the flesh seems to stop it, and it (choking) falls to the ground, unmoving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my bonus-- oh wait, that's a 4th-level spell. Should I use it or not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Save it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I'll save it. I'm going to transfer the Hunter's Mark to the one attacking my brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your bonus action? All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then Trinket is going to run up and stand next to my brother so you can get flank attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike's up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh jeez. Okay. So I think--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Fire!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should she do turn undead?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She could turn undead, but how far are they? They're probably too far apart. Well, no, she could stand between them and do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Each undead she can see within 30 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's going to take a step diagonally down this way and then turnt undead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turnt undead? That's a whole different ability.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wisdom saving throw. Spell save is 18. If they're challenge rating four or lower, they're blowed up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a wisdom save?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, wisdom save, and that just means they're scared.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they all fail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! They're scared of her!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she holds up her holy symbol, you watch as this radiant glow in the shape of Sarenrae emits from behind her. These giant golden wings emerge, and for a moment, you can see the beautiful dark complexion and flaming hair rise behind Pike. As that scatters outward, you watch as the faces of these undead troll creatures all of a sudden shift into this look of absolute horror, and they all go (guttural groan) and begin to make their way to turn and run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Turn and run?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they have to move away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also cannot take reactions. For its action, it can use only the dash action. All they can do is run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If it's got nowhere to move, it can use dodge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) A do ron-ron-ron, a do ron-ron.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. How long does that last?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't say, does it? One minute, or until it takes any damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fe fi fo fuck it! Can I run over here? (counting) And I'm going to smashy pants the troll. Reckless, Great Weapon Master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20. That's the third one today! That's a d10, though. Right, d10?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: d10, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) 63.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Oh shit. As you rush up behind, as it's turning to run away from Pike, (snarl) it turns around and its face comes right up to yours as you go (whack). Its jaw rockets off and scatters across the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice. At least it can't do a bite attack any more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You think that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You think that. It's got upper teeth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's more of a jagged headbutt. So that's your first attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Same thing. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A natural-- shit, what was it? So it was a-- shit, I can't do reverse math.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man. What the hell?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Oh no! That hurt my brain. It was an eight. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Does 19 hit your armor class?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This guy has got up and down. Oh, no, now I can't do math at all. 24. 34.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer 34 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. So 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So he didn't strike the troll at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You knock the jaw off, and as you swing back with a backwards strike, the arm seems to swing around in a circle, and then clobber you in the back of the head and you're like (grunts). You spit blood on the ground, and you feel the ringing in the back of your skull.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck is this stupid-ass hammer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys look over and watch as Grog bludgeons himself in the back of the head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't know you were so flexible, Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you drunk?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A little, yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Grog's turn. Vax, you're up. That guy's no longer frightened, by the way, because you did do damage to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As my bonus action-- I do have a bonus action-- can I use my second wind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. 1d10. (counting) 11 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. What are you doing, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What I'm going to do is turn to Trinket really quick and say, guard this dead thing, and then I'm going to use my movement and dash action, if necessary, to sprint around and flank that troll between me and Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Because it is frightened, and it's within view of Pike, it does not make an attack of opportunity on you. It doesn't even notice you. You step over and rush this way, and you are now there flanking it with Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Flanking with Keyleth? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could do Scanlan if you wanted to move there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If Keyleth is on the other side-- as long as I'm flanking, either way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So do you want to go the other way, against Grog?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm fine. I'm flanking with Keyleth right now? To the butt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I might drop a Fireball on your ass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine. 28 on the first. And ooh, 30-something on the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they both hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so first one is (counting) 11 plus psychic is 12, plus those guys. (counting) 28 for that one. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 points of damage? Hold on. Yeah, it falls to the ground, unmoving (gurgle) as you stab it in the back of the skull. You guys watch as the dagger, as Whisper (splat) protrudes from the front of the skull and it (gurgle, splat) and slumps to the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was the first one. The second one I'm going to shove it down into its eye socket and just grind it around for the second attack, even though it's down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it's on the ground. It's easy enough. You go ahead and grab the back of its motionless skull, jam in, dig around and scramble the brains on the inside with your dagger. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it. Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Vax's turn. The corpse on the ground, as you're scrambling its brains, suddenly its other eye flickers open. It reaches up and grabs you, and from the ground, it's going to use you to pull itself back up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got to chop it up or set it on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, it's going to take a claw attack at you. That is a 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to spin around and claw at Scanlan behind with a 17?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of slashing damage. And after it finds purchase on you, it realizes that you're a little more vulnerable. Its claws still dug in your shoulder, it's going to pull you in and it's going to attempt to, using its upper jaw, jam its teeth down into you; the lower jaw with the tongue is dangling out at this point. That is 25.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take five points of piercing damage and make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did a constitution save 20 minutes ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I don't know what it means!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's pretty good. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All righty. This one's going to get back up from the ground, it's going to crawl its way back to its feet and it's going to unload on Pike again, as she's right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It hasn't been hit yet since she--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was dead when she did turn undead; it was not affected by it. But it has since regenerated itself back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was it dead or was it undead? I'm just being stupid; go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 15. That's a 14. Then with its bite attack that is a 22. What's her armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 with the shield, yeah. It goes to bite towards her, its jaw tearing open, the muscle actually stretching and pulling with each bite as its body's falling apart, and she beats it back with her armor and shield. No effect. And this one here, which has not been damaged, is going to go ahead and run the fuck away. You guys don't even see where it is right now. All right. That brings us to Scanlan's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Jesus. There's all these people around. All right, I'm going to step away from the troll, and I'm going to light it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you step back, it's going to go ahead and make--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought it was frightened!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeez, Scanlan! You need better armor!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Matt! Did you skip me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you were last; you're after Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, remember you rolled shit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I know. Yeah, no, I remember that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or did I skip you last turn, you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the second time he's going, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Oh, I must have skipped you last turn! I'm so sorry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay. I don't think I've done anything yet. I've only dodged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So anyway, that's six points of piercing damage to you. Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth. What are you doing, twice, because it's my fault?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's still my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right, sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fireball! Wand of Fireball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To who?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To that troll who just hit me. I was backing away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to smoke everybody?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I asked!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can place it to where it might hit both of them and not us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it that big?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, dude.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit! Well, then yeah, I'm smoking them both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. In order to do that, you're going to hit Pike, Vax, and Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, friends!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. Pike has fire resistance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't have to hit me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need Grog, Vax and Pike to make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it possible to do it without hitting Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Not at that size. He probably could, but it'll hit Trinket. Your choice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Scanlan's choice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, Grog or Trinket? You're going to hit one or the other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely Grog. I love my Trinket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But he just goes back into the necklace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, you're right. Then I'll hit Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're a dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll a dexterity save for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, motherfuck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I already rolled terribly for Pike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a wand, so I'm using three charges. It's 10d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! Right! All right. So 10d6 points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have zero d6 right now. I don't what happened to mine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike got a five. Vax got a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and your spell, what's the DC on the wand? 15? So yeah, you succeed. You take no damage, being a rogue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a good roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 40 points of fire damage. 20 to Pike, because she's resistant. None to that. 40 to Trinket. You watch as both of the standing trolls scatter to ash. They turn to burned dust and nothing as their bodies are consumed by the flame of the Fireball, leaving nothing but smoke and a shadow of their form against the wall. All right, Scanlan. That ends your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, and to refresh, that's a wand. Does that still use my spell slot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the wand has charges on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you use that wand again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it regenerates after a long rest. I have to roll for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it's not a one-shot; it's got several charges, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's got several charges. It's got more in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you write down how many charges it has?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax, do you want to check for traps and see if there's anything interesting in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, what do you want to do? There's still one troll over here that ran out of sight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He ran out of sight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's go plunder the loot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys go plunder the loot. I'll creep over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry about missing your turn. I feel so bad about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's okay! You're so cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're going where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to see if I can see him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six, and you're going to dash with your action to move over?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I not see him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not with your basic movement, no. There's a wall. Okay, so you move around the corner and you watch as the troll is currently locked in the corner with its back to the wall, going, (monster noises).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go, hey it's okay, calm-- Fireball! Out of the staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Goodness gracious, great balls of fire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no, that won't hit anything but himself and the surrounding chamber. Go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (counting) Can I get two more d6s from you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're doing a standard 8d6?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's out of my staff. I can't do any more, right? Reroll, yep. (singing) Like a d6, like a like a d6! (counting) 35 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35 damage. All righty. (explosion) The explosion hits and bursts around. The flames burn, and you can see some flames are catching on the troll. (monster noises). Still alive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to take my bonus action to do something I've never done before. I'm going to trace, from my staff, and pull out a flame blade. (shing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! So you guys watch as Keyleth puts her fingers across the top of the staff. Where her fingers arc around, it creates this arc of fire, and when she stops she grabs on to a hilt that didn't exist, but now does, in her hand. That arc of flame that stayed suddenly solidifies into a scimitar-like blade that's in her hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do that?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's a fucking Jedi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn? All right, Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't even see it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can imagine it in the abstract universe, though. I sure can, Laura Bailey! I sure can!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, look who's back in the fight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's all. Ain't nothing else happening. Just taking a look. Yeah, she's got this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, ends Percival's turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm going to fly over. Can I get to a place where I can see the troll? Well, how many is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to fly down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have 50 feet on my broom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could dash. Broom dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd get right around there and see it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to shoot him! And he's still Hunter's Marked!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank god. I didn't say it; it didn't happen. 13 plus three lightning damage. Plus one Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first strike hits it. It still has the fire trailing up its body. Second shot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Say the thing that you wanted to say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry. I only get two per short rest, so if we don't rest, then I don't get it again! Six lightning damage, plus nine, plus two. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both arrows hit it in the chest. One, two! It's still standing there, the flames curling around it. The ceiling, by the way, from the impact of the Fireball, is looking pretty fragile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But that's the exit. That's where we need to go to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see, Keyleth, from this perspective, there's a small opening on the far wall where it looks like possibly whoever raided this vault had previously tunneled into it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit! Would Trinket have been able to make it over to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. It's possible. End of your turn, Vex? Pike's up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike saw Keyleth go running down that way, so she is going to run after her. (counting) She can't see the troll from there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can see the troll just past the corner, there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She can see the troll? Oh my god, I think it's time for a Guiding Bolt!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Guiding Bolt up the butt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's our next T-shirt. Guiding Bolt up the butt!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d6 radiant damage and the next attack roll-- okay. Yeah, make a spell ranged attack plus ten, because it's Pike. Yeah, you've got to attack. Yo, here's the white die you gave me. 13 plus ten is 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Extra damage because it's undead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think so. 12. Guiding Bolt!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Specifically toward the taint, Matt. Pike's on a tear today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. As she comes around the corner, the holy symbol in one hand, clutching behind the shield, she notches the edge of the mace at the edge of her belt and releases a bolt of energy. How do you want to do this? Because the radiant damage shuts down the undead fortitude, and the fire knocks down the regeneration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Guiding Bolt streaks through the air, loops down to the ground, up through the butt, up out the head, and out the mouth. Everyone vaguely hears, "That's my Pike." And its head explodes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the radiant energy bursting out of its eyes, and as it screams, its head blasted upward, the energy bursting through its mouth, the jaw begins to burn away as the flames left over from the Fireball consume the rest of its body. It tumbles to its knees and burns into this skeletal mass that turns to ash on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That happened in six seconds. It was like, (explosions).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get out of here. It's crumbling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are chests about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take my flaming sword and do a few Jedi kid moves. When no one's looking, go (lightsaber noises).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go check for traps on that chest right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? Okay. Does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, then I'm going to open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You open it? There are seven gold pieces, two silver, and the rest of it's empty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome. Look at all this money!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll check for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, okay. Room does not appear to be trapped, from what you can see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to check that trunk. The chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to check that for traps, as well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not quite as-- seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check. Seven? Doesn't appear to be trapped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Opens. It's not locked. There's about 12 pieces of gold, two copper, a silver. This place has been cleared out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pick up that little pile of gold, those couple pieces of gold I see on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole ceiling right there in the corner goes (crashing). This entire chamber.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The door's covered!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you get through it, Keyleth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember, there were three different ways, though, and we took one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the one we need, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, realizing that the druid and the goliath are going to have to figure that out, Vax walks to the middle there and starts to take a wee in the corner. It's been a long time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to go through the collapsed doorway, or do we want to go back to one of the other tunnels?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever other tunnel options, there's probably other monsters, trolls, fucking undead waiting there, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is on you, Grog. No, don't use any spells. Don't use any spells. Grog, punch through this shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, I can Commune with Nature and maybe figure out the tunnel system, or depending on where we are and if we think we're on that time crunch and we want to get going-- I didn't want to burn this yet. I did bring Find the Path, which is a one-day concentration spell which gets us to where we want to go as quick as possible. But I don't know. Can I do that with Thar Amphala?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you need to know where you're going for that spell to work?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if we're getting to Thar Amphala.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a big city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's concentration for up to one day, but if you lose concentration halfway through--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which is why I haven't wanted to do it yet, until we felt like we needed to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To a specific, fixed location you're familiar with in the same plane of existence. So you could, in theory, say, "Thar Amphala," and it would guide you to the fastest path there until you lost concentration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just saying, we have that at our disposal when we feel. Do we want to do a quick Commune with Nature, then, to try and get paths? It's going to take a few minutes, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What would that tell you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could get an idea of the tunnel system for a three-mile radius.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, let her do her thing. I think we can afford a few minutes. Then Grog could finish attuning-- oh, you did. That "stop hitting yourself" hammer was attuned.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, have I finished attuning with the black hammer of face-smash?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the hammer called the Stop Hitting Yourself hammer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can make out with it, it is an adamantine hammer, but there is something wrong about its enchantment. There is something about it that is locked into your soul at the moment. It's occupying a portion of yourself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you guys have dealt with cursed items before. This is a cursed item.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Greater Restoration? I'm looking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I know it's cursed? It's a familiar feeling? From Craven Edge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Craven wasn't cursed. Craven was intelligent. This is something has sunk into you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's going to try to Greater Restoration Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She'll grab him by the cheeks and squish the cheeks and say, "Grog, don't go touching things "you don't know what they are!" Cast Greater Restoration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hold that it had on you is lifted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think I'm going to leave this here, if that's cool with you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She gives you the mom look and says, "Don't touch it, okay?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have time to attune to your other thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll pick up the Bloodaxe out of the Bag of Holding and start attuning to that again. Old trusty Bloodaxe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are taking a short rest to attune? In caves and other natural underground settings. Make a nature check. The radius is only 300 feet when you're underground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. One, this is not a natural underground location. The entirety of this area is the inside of an ancient, powerful elemental entity. Also, the spell doesn't function where nature has been replaced by construction, such as dungeons and towns, so for the most part, that spell would not aid you. My apologies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you're not letting me cast it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm not letting you cast it. That nature check was to see whether or not the surroundings would help you, so you know not to waste that spell. So as you take your short rest, you attune to your proper weapon, and you begin to talk amongst yourselves as to what the next proper path or action to take is as you climb through the crypts toward your destination, we're going to go ahead and end tonight's session there. It's just past 11.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got to take a picture of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great game, guys. Well done. We'll pick this up in a couple weeks. This is an upward dungeon crawl. This is fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He must have fallen against a mountain in an upright manner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the titan? The titan was thrust into the ground in a mountain range. The mountain range rose up around it. Technically you wouldn't know this, but it doesn't matter. Part of the battle that smote the titan thrust it downward and created the mountain range around it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's amazing. Nice job, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick this up in a couple weeks. You guys will return next week, where you'll get to see this awesome man run his awesome game!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to be awesome! It's all set in the world of Alice in Wonderland.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Recharge, reset, energize, go nuts. Miss you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll miss you too, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any Critters who are on the playa with these guys, they will take off their clothes if you ask them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! They need to recharge! Give them some space, let them recharge!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you see me topless, please don't take a photo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why would you say that?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was a joke! It was a fucking joke that the internet will take too seriously, I'm sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll be topless on Sam's one-shot. You can look at me instead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you see Liam topless, take all the photos.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Push-ups for seven days; here we go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rest well, and is it Thursday yet? Good night! [music]
